name: Build a wooden shelter
goal: Safe shelter with foundation, walls, roof, and door

steps.title: Analyze & Prepare
steps.details: Check inventory for wood/logs. Plan a specific origin coordinate near the bot.

steps.title: Foundation
steps.details: Place the floor. USE THE SAME ORIGIN COORDINATE FOR ALL STEPS. params: { "structure": "platform", "width": 5, "length": 5, "material": "oak_planks", "origin": {x,y,z} }

steps.title: Roof
steps.details: Build the roof on top (y+3). params: { "structure": "roof", "width": 5, "length": 5, "material": "oak_planks", "origin": {SAME_AS_ABOVE, but y+3} }
